author: Adameus
title: They're pens
review:
It is a bunch of gel pens which happen to interlock with LEGO. The main idea here is that you can build on the parts with studs, but the pen might get too heavy for it's intended use (writing) if you build a lot on it. The pens themselves are quite interesting parts, as they can be used as a pole or such.

As for the writing part... yeah they write? The colours are nice, but the shape of the pen is pretty uncomfortable.
